relation.text: prevented me . However , perhaps a Letter may be more acceptable to you now
this Season is a great Disappointment to us -- however , your Reasons are so good , that we take
will serve us for a Villa in the Summer
ceased . We have another great Singer here now
is made as commodious as it can be -- it is not spacious enough to be sure -- but certainly it is better to have the Opera there , than to have none . I have been pretty often at the Play this Season
heard good Accounts of my Sister , a few Days ago
